translations: n.拇囊炎（bunion 的复数形式）

phrs.translation: 姆趾黏液囊肿大, 拇囊炎, 囊肿, 䔧

sentences.sentence: In very severe cases, bunions may be surgically removed.
sentences.translation: 在非常严重的情况下，拇趾囊肿可能要手术切除。

sentences.sentence: So brag about your kids or complain about your bunions.
sentences.translation: 所以，还是在你的信里吹嘘一下自己的孩子，或者抱怨一下自己的肿脚。

sentences.sentence: It can lead to plantar fasciitis and heel pain and can worsen hammertoes and bunions.
sentences.translation: 肥胖会导致足底筋膜炎和足跟疼痛，也会使槌状趾和囊炎肿(也就是鸡眼，译者注)恶化。
